column2: I am a neuroscientist and programmer on open-source projects. I work on insect brains. I am interested in how neurons wire together, and how they work together to build complex, innate behaviours. Alive since **23/09/1993**.
This table shows all of my work, searchable on pudmed. Position is my place in the author list, capping at 6. IF is the journal's impact factor. Get in contact for information on recents projects.
